title: Telegraph jug
text: The American and British flags adorn this pitcher, along with a ribbon below bearing the inscription: <I>EUROPE AND AMERICA ARE UNITED BY TELEGRAPH GLORY TO GOD IN THE HIGHEST ON EARTH PEACE GOODWILL TOWARDS MEN<I>.  The text and cable motifs on the sides and handle relate to the first trans-Atlantic telegraph cable, laid between England and America in 1866, which this jug commemorates.
description: white pitcher with twisted handle; cord design on body; one side of spout has American flag; opposite side has flag with rampant lions and harp
creditline: Gift of Various Donors, by exchange
